thumb.title: Mai - We can live in peace
thumb.description: 終戦記念日なので反戦ソングをJapan’s “End of World War II Memorial Day”(August 15) known as "Shusen Kinenbi" in Japan,marks the day in 1945 when the Japanese people were informed that the war had ended.On this day, Emperor Hirohito announced Japan’s acceptance of the Potsdam Declaration in a radio broadcast, known as the “Jewel Voice Broadcast.” This declaration brought an end to Japan’s participation in World War II.The day is dedicated to mourning those who lost their lives in the war and reflecting on the importance of peace. Memorial ceremonies and peace events are held across the country.While many countries recognize September 2—the day Japan formally signed the surrender documents—as the official end of the war, in Japan, August 15 is observed as the end of the war."We can live in peace"Synthesizer V AI Mai2DOSUKOI-P AI
thumb.last_res_body: うぽつです！！ 8888888 元ネタは、爆弾を... おつおつ 888888 うぽぽぽん
